page.title: 06CLACTON GARDEN CENTRE
page.content: It has been a garden centre for 17 years.Before it was a farm called Bluehouse Farm.The manager has always lived in Clacton.He owns five acres of land.Out of the indoor and outdoor section,conifers and shrubs etc. sell the best.Coaches of tourists sometimes come.He has sold health food for 8 to 10 years.Over the years it has been developed more.Sunday is the busiest day. He is open all week.He opens at 8.00am and closes at 9.00pm.The busiest time is from 11.00am till 1.00pm and he has nine workers.
